mapper.sql: id, username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, create_time, login_time,status
mapper.update: UPDATE ums_admin SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, icon = #{icon}, email = #{id}, nick_name = #{nickName}, note = #{note} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into ums_admin (id, username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, create_time, login_time,status) values (#{id},#{username},#{password},#{icon},#{email},#{nickName},#{note},#{createTime},#{loginTime},#{status});
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, icon, email, nick_name, nick_name, create_time, login_time,status FROM ums_admin rr WHERE rr.id=#{id}
